2012.question: Name the poets who wrote the following lines:
2012.prashna: उन कवियों के नाम बताइए जिन्होंने निम्नलिखित पंक्तियाँ लिखी हैं:

sub_questions.a: For he seemed to me again like a king. Like a king in exile, uncrowned in the underworld, Now due to be crowned again.
sub_questions.b: I who have lost My way and beg now at strangers doors to Receive love, at least in small change?
sub_questions.c: Where are the songs of Spring? Aye, where are they? Think not of them, thou hast they music too.
sub_questions.d: If I should die, think only this of me: That there's some corner of a foreign field that is for ever England.
sub_questions.e: I celebrate myself, and sing myself, And what I assume you shall assume, For every atom belonging to me as good belongs to you.

anuprashna.a: For he seemed to me again like a king. Like a king in exile, uncrowned in the underworld, Now due to be crowned again.
anuprashna.b: I who have lost My way and beg now at strangers doors to Receive love, at least in small change?
anuprashna.c: Where are the songs of Spring? Aye, where are they? Think not of them, thou hast they music too.
anuprashna.d: If I should die, think only this of me: That there's some corner of a foreign field that is for ever England.
anuprashna.e: I celebrate myself, and sing myself, And what I assume you shall assume, For every atom belonging to me as good belongs to you.

2014.question: Name the authors of the following works:
2014.prashna: निम्नलिखित कृतियों के लेखकों के नाम बताइए:

2014.question: Write a short note on English as a world language.
2014.prashna: विश्व भाषा के रूप में अंग्रेजी पर एक संक्षिप्त टिप्पणी लिखें।

2017.question: Read the following sentences and state whether they are true or false:
2017.prashna: निम्नलिखित वाक्यों को पढ़ें और बताएं कि वे सही हैं या गलत:

sub_questions.a: There must have been a time when homosapiens was a very rare species.
sub_questions.b: The ways of managing childbirth in traditional societies are not many and varied.

anuprashna.a: एक समय ऐसा रहा होगा जब होमोसैपियंस एक बहुत ही दुर्लभ प्रजाति थी।
anuprashna.b: पारंपरिक समाजों में प्रसव के प्रबंधन के तरीके बहुत और विविध नहीं हैं।

2019.question: Have you seen ........... Taj Mahal (Choose the best option of article)
The man was .................... by a dog. (Choose the meaningful expression)
English used since AD 1500 is called .................... (Choose the best option)
New varieties of English that have emerged in different parts of the world is called .................... (Choose the suitable option)
Walter de la Mare makes us aware of the .................... (Choose the suitable option)
Answer any six of the following in about 30–50 words each:

sub_questions.a: Why did our ancestors denounce us from luxuries and pleasures?
sub_questions.b: What is Shobh’s father’s reason to dislike a minister?
sub_questions.c: Why does Dr. Zakir Husain call India ‘the young state of an ancient people’?
sub_questions.d: What was the great lesson that India had to teach the West?
sub_questions.e: In the poem ‘An Epitaph’, what happens when the poet dies?
sub_questions.f: Why is Macavity called a ‘master criminal’?
sub_questions.g: Why is the speaker in ‘My Grandmother’s House’ proud of living in that house?
sub_questions.h: What did the Fire Hymn say to the speaker?
sub_questions.i: What are the features of a sonnet?
sub_questions.j: Why are the Indians quick learners of English?

2020.question: He said to me, "will you post this letter for me?" (Choose the correct indirect narration)
2020.prashna: उसने मुझसे कहा, "क्या तुम मेरे लिए यह पत्र पोस्ट करोगे?" (सही इनडायरेक्ट नरेशन चुनें)

options.A: He asked me if I would post that letter for him
options.B: He asked me if I would post this letter to him
options.C: He asked me if I will post that letter to him
options.D: He said to me if I would post that letter to him

vikalpa.A: He asked me if I would post that letter for him
vikalpa.B: He asked me if I would post this letter to him
vikalpa.C: He asked me if I will post that letter to him
vikalpa.D: He said to me if I would post that letter to him

2020.question: ………..he drive to work? (Choose the best option)
2020.prashna: क्या वह गाड़ी चलाकर काम पर जाता है? (सबसे अच्छा विकल्प चुनें)

2020.question: John Donne is a…………..poet. (Choose the correct option)
2020.prashna: जॉन डोने एक ………….. कवि हैं। (सही विकल्प चुनें)

2020.question: "And as we walk, we make the pledge that we shall (Choose the correct option)
2020.prashna: "And as we walk, we make the pledge that we shall (सही विकल्प चुनें)

2021.question: They made her ............... a new contract. (Choose the correct option)
2021.prashna: उन्होंने उससे नए अनुबंध पर ............... करवाया। (सही विकल्प चुनें)

2021.question: ............... he went for a walk. (Choose the correct phrase)
She has learned her lessons. (Choose the correct passive voice)
2021.prashna: उसने अपने पाठ याद कर लिए हैं। (सही पैसिव वॉयस चुनें)

options.A: Her lessons has learned by her
options.B: Her lessons has been learned by her
options.D: Her lessons have been learned by her

vikalpa.A: उसके पाठ उसके द्वारा याद किए गए हैं (गलत हेल्पिंग वर्ब)
vikalpa.B: उसके पाठ उसके द्वारा याद किए गए हैं (सिंगुलर हेल्पिंग वर्ब)
vikalpa.C: उसके पाठ उसके द्वारा याद किए गए (अपूर्ण)
vikalpa.D: उसके पाठ उसके द्वारा याद किए गए हैं

2021.question:
Explain any one of the following : 
d) "There's absolutely no future for a boy like you."
2021.prashna:
निम्नलिखित में से किसी एक की व्याख्या करें: 
d) "तुम्हारे जैसे लड़के के लिए बिल्कुल कोई भविष्य नहीं है।"

2021.question:
Write the summary of any one of the following poems : 
i) An Epitaph 
ii) Ode to Autumn 
iii) Song of Myself.
2021.prashna:
निम्नलिखित कविताओं में से किसी एक का सारांश लिखें: 
i) एन एपिटाफ 
ii) ओड टू ऑटम 
iii) सॉन्ग ऑफ मायसेल्फ।

2021.question:
Write a note on Indian English. 
OR 
What are the difficulties faced by an Indian student in learning English ? 
OR 
Briefly discuss the difference between a short story and a novel.
2021.prashna:
इंडियन इंग्लिश पर एक नोट लिखें। 
अथवा 
एक भारतीय छात्र को अंग्रेजी सीखने में किन कठिनाइयों का सामना करना पड़ता है? 
अथवा 
एक छोटी कहानी और एक उपन्यास के बीच के अंतर पर संक्षेप में चर्चा करें।

2022.question: I went out to ............ my friend. (Choose the correct phrase)
2022.prashna: मैं अपने मित्र को ............ बाहर गया था। (सही वाक्यांश चुनें)

2022.question: Would you mind ............ the door? (Choose the correct tense form)
2022.prashna: क्या आप दरवाजा ............ करेंगे? (सही काल रूप चुनें)

2022.question: For what purpose had Nanukaka come to Delhi ?
2022.prashna: नानूकाका किस उद्देश्य से दिल्ली आए थे?

vikalpa.B: जमींदार सम्मेलन में शामिल होने के लिए
vikalpa.D: कुछ मंत्रियों से मिलने के लिए

2022.question: A dust whom ............ bore, shaped, made aware, ...
2022.prashna: एक धूल जिसे ............ ने जन्म दिया, आकार दिया, जागरूक बनाया, ...

2022.question:
b) Write the summary of any one of the following prose-pieces :
i) The Artist
ii) A Child is Born
iii) India Through a Traveller's Eyes.
2022.prashna:
ख) निम्नलिखित में से किसी एक गद्य-रचना का सारांश लिखें:
i) द आर्टिस्ट
ii) अ चाइल्ड इज बोर्न
iii) इंडिया थ्रू अ ट्रैवलर्स आइज़

2023.prashna: मुझे फिनिश लाइन तक और वापस ........... होगा। (सही विकल्प चुनें)

2023.question: She is wise...........timid. (Choose the correct option)
2023.prashna: वह बुद्धिमान है ........... डरपोक। (सही विकल्प चुनें)

2023.question: The government by the representatives of the people is called....... (Choose the correct option)
2023.prashna: जनता के प्रतिनिधियों द्वारा शासन को ....... कहा जाता है (सही विकल्प चुनें)

2023.question: "I Have a Dream" is part of a………….
2023.prashna: "आई हैव अ ड्रीम" एक …………. का हिस्सा है।

2023.question: For Auden, poetry was a
2023.prashna: ऑडेन के लिए कविता एक थी

2024.question: There is ........... university here. (Choose the correct option)
‘How often I think of going there, to peer through blind eyes of windows.’ It is from
2024.prashna: ‘मैं कितनी बार वहाँ जाने के बारे में सोचता हूँ, खिड़कियों की अंधी आँखों से झाँकने के लिए।’ यह कहाँ से लिया गया है?

2024.question: “And when I crumble, who will remember” — is from
2024.prashna: “और जब मैं बिखर जाऊंगा, तो कौन याद रखेगा” — कहाँ से है?

2025.question: Shyam teaches Mathematics ......... English.
2025.prashna: श्याम अंग्रेजी के ......... गणित पढ़ाता है।

2025.question: Chose the correctly spelt word :
2025.prashna: सही वर्तनी वाले शब्द का चयन करें :

options.A: Neither of the girls solves its task
options.B: Neither of the girls solves her task
options.C: Neither of the girls solves their task
options.D: Neither of the girls solve her tasks

vikalpa.A: Neither of the girls solves its task
vikalpa.B: Neither of the girls solves her task
vikalpa.C: Neither of the girls solves their task
vikalpa.D: Neither of the girls solve her tasks

2025.question: A variety of music ......... available here.
2025.prashna: यहाँ विभिन्न प्रकार का संगीत उपलब्ध है।

2025.question: ......... got the Nobel Prize in literature in 1950.
'Leaves of Grass' was published in
2025.prashna: 'Leaves of Grass' किस वर्ष प्रकाशित हुआ था?

2025.question: Write a note on the dialects of Middle English.
2025.prashna: मिडल इंग्लिश (मध्य अंग्रेजी) की बोलियों पर एक टिप्पणी लिखें।
